content:
Sambass，又称drum ‘n’ bossa或drum ‘n’ Sambass（“桑巴"和"贝斯”的组合），是一种具有地域性特点的Drum and Bass音乐的子流派，主要源自巴西，它将Drum and Bass节奏与拉丁美洲音乐相结合。


该流派的流行艺术家包括DJ Marky、DJ Patife、XRS Land、Drumagick、Bungle、Marcelinho da Lua、Kaleidoscopio和DJ Roots。由意大利唱片公司Cuadra发行的四张合辑《Sambass Vol.1》至《Sambass Vol.4》受到国际好评。
contentEn:
Sambass, drum 'n' bossa or drum 'n' sambass (a portmanteau of "samba" and "bass") is a regional subgenre of drum and bass music mostly native to Brazil,[1] which combines drum and bass rhythms with influences from Latin American music.

 

Popular artists in the genre include DJ Marky, DJ Patife, XRS Land, Drumagick, Bungle, Marcelinho da Lua, Kaleidoscopio and DJ Roots. Four compilation albums titles Sambass Vol. 1 through Sambass Vol. 4 were released to international acclaim, by the Italian record label Cuadra.[2]
remarks:

name: Sambass
descriptions: Sambass，又称drum‘n’bossa或drum‘n’Sambass（“桑巴"和"贝斯”的组合），是一种具有地域性特点的Drum and Bass音乐的子流派，主要源自巴西，它将Drum and Bass节奏与拉丁美洲音乐相结合。
originalStyle: Drum and bass, samba, samba rock, sambalanço, bossa nova
representArtist: DJ Marky, DJ Patife, XRS Land, Drumagick, Bungle, Marcelinho da Lua, Kaleidoscopio, DJ Roots
